channel.title: Spawn City development & discussion
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ksiTy.png[/img] The city is situated on the beautiful east coast of the spawn area, and overlooks a stunning metropolitan region. It has convenient access to nearby business and recreational services, and boasts a robust rail network.
Queens Borough is one of the most historic sectors of the city, originally established by the founding citizens. It contains around eight residences, including the original administration room. It is the most accessible sector, as it has access to the city foyer, Falkirk Borough, and New Town.
Falkirk Borough is a new sector currently under development, and is named after the town situated in the Forth Valley of Scotland. It will provide for sixteen homes, along with four watchtowers designed to protect the city. It will be the most modern sector, and will include a range of electromechanical services provided by pistons and redstone circuitry.
The Albany Farms were cultivated to provide for the growing city population. The farms grow a range of crops including cacti, wheat and sugar cane. As Frederick the Great wisely put it, an army marches on its stomach. The sector also contains the city's main train station, and three houses.
New Town was the third sector to be added to the city, and was established in response to the rapidly growing population. It is the commercial zone of the city and contains publicly and privately funded buildings, including a library and a hotel.
[b]City Leader:[/b] Magma828
[b]Citizens:[/b] Charmanmow0 Darkworlder Herobrine KillerLAWL Ponyboy619 Demonikillu oyh Acet Mudura Ancient8989 Ituharu

item.title: Spawn City development & discussion
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:17, topic:402912”][quote author=Travas link=topic=499974.msg3666946#msg3666946 date=1310676952]

Where is the Nether portal located?

As soon as you enter the main gates coming from spawn, you will see a giant news board, behind that is a tower, keep walking past that tower, you will see the portal. It looks like a creeper, you won’t miss it.
[/quote] i ment its nether coords… -.-[/quote]Portals around spawn (and anywhere else where there’s a number of portals in a given area) are glitched, so you can walk in to the nether but when you walk out you go to a portal in the given area.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas

Where is the Nether portal located?

As soon as you enter the main gates coming from spawn, you will see a giant news board, behind that is a tower, keep walking past that tower, you will see the portal. It looks like a creeper, you won’t miss it.
[/quote] i ment its nether coords… -.-[/quote]
oops. :o

Anyway, I’m fairly sure the portal is deactivated anyway, due to griefers etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn City development & discussion
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

The town has gone downhill. It has been griefed majorly since most of the population, including myself, has left to start life in the wilderness with the new residence plugin. No one is around to report, very few people remain.

Read full topic

[quote="`SJ_, post:4, topic:402912"]Last I checked I was 4th ranking in the city right :P[/quote]I don’t know, nobody ever told me about any of this ranking stuff. I remember you telling me that tom was 1st ranking so I was inclined to just ignore it as he didn’t start the city, didn’t help build it, consumed all of our resources, and did whatever damage to the city he felt like just because he’s staff.

[quote=“darkworlder, post:5, topic:402912”]Here’s an updated grid. The middle, a beautiful town hall.
There are nice tree decor.[/quote]
Looks good, are the rectangle things the tree areas? What will you make the town hall out of?

item.title: Spawn City development & discussion
item.dc:creator: @darkworlder darkworlder
item.description:
@darkworlder wrote:

Here’s the grass grid Of the new sector… The different colored grass spots are house lots.

The house lots are 10x10.
The grid is 64x63 x16.
As you can see, there enough room for a town-center or town-hall.

Read full topic
